name: Wgl.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome to Weiguo Lin's resume Page.
## markov text generator
My first project is markov text generator, [markov text generator](https://github.com/roachman/markov-tweet-genrator).

For this project, user can insert a tweet into our program, and our generator will give you a similar tweet generated from our program.

## mine-sweeper
second project is a command line minesweeper,[minesweeper](https://github.com/roachman/minesweeper) play like the classic minesweeper, just use the command line to insert the coordinates you want to click on the map.

you can set the map size mine number as you want, our program will draw the map in the command line and each time you select a point to reveal, there is also a update in the map, until you hit a mine or avoid them all.

## gee-mail
Our last project is gee-mail, a secure mail box you can use for privacy protection message transmit.[gee-mail](https://github.com/roachman/geemail)

Allow our user to have a register if they are new to our system, after the regular user name and password, we give that user the messages they have not read and allow them to write to other users, once they se

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
